UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of multifunctional cationic peptides derived from peptic hydrolysates of rice bran protein
Literature.Author: Taniguchi M, Kameda M, Namae T, Ochiai A, Saitoh E, Tanaka T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans NBRC 1385(IC50=289µM),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(no activity data),Cutibacterium acnes JCM 6473(no activity data),Streptococcus mutans JCM 5705(no activity data)
